author: wmtan
body:
The recent reversion to Conditions database V1 as the default breaks virtually all (if not all) the relvals in ROOT6.   Although I understand that this reversion is temporary and will go away very soon, I'd rather get the fix in the ROOT6 IB now, as without it everything fails.
Please merge this request before the next IB if possible.
title: Go back to conditions database V2
